issue.title: [Rust] Remove "array_ops" in favor of the "compute" sub-module
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6881](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6881). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once 4591 (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4591) is complete only filter and limit will remain in the "array_ops" module and they can be moved under the "compute" sub-crate.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6881?focusedCommentId=16964788) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5757
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5757>
